note.p: Death: 5 Berkeley St, Piccadilly, London (08 July 1869)
Education: Mr Richards' school, Tiverton, Devon; BA (1820), MA (1823) Cambridge
Career: Curate, Uckfield, Sussex (1822); Rector of Little Bowden, Northamptonshire (1830-1843); Secretary of Royal Institution (1842-1860); Chaplain in ordinary, Kensington Palace (1854-1867)
